question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto-derive/src/lib.rs] [Function: derive_enum_valid_crypto_material()] [Variant Validation] Does impl_enum_valid_crypto_material ensure all enum variants are cryptographically valid types, or could non-crypto types be mixed in causing type confusion?
